name: ZX81 - Rush (2013)
description:
A heist has gone wrong and now you are being chased!

Escape the police by running and jumping from rooftop to rooftop, while grabbing leftover cash wherever you can

Now run!

Game Features:

- Available on Cassette Tape and as Digital Download
- Multi layer Parallax scrolling
- Internet Highscore uploading
- Online rewards
- Support for AY-sound boards
- ZXpand joystick interface support
